summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to draw and the City Treasurer to pay a warrant on Local Improvement Fund, District No. 2480, for the improvement of Twenty-sixth Avenue South et al., by grading, etc., in favor of John W. Roberts, assignee of Andrew Peterson, contractor for said improvement, for the purpose of paying interest due on Superior Court judgment against the City of Seattle, in Cause No. 105681 of said Court.
